title: How do i watch a really old match
body: I wanna watch my very first penta kill with illaoi I had a really long time ago but I don't know how to reach it, the client cant go that far back, ive tried this software called "LOLReplay" but it couldn't find my match, I don't know what to do. If theres any other software or I'm just to dumb to figure this out but pls help. My match with illaoi was on 6/28/17 if anyone was wondering.

replies.body: If you never saved a highlight from a replay you wanted before a new patch drops, you may not ever be able to see that again =\ .We don't have every games replay saved in any form, and replay files will no longer work on newer patch cycles.
